website_summaries.verdict: Solid brass dovetail marker with two slope proportions – one for hardwood and one for softwood.
pros: Small and handy tool allows precision and ease in completing layout lines for hand-cut dovetails
Template portion is CNC machined from solid brass
Use with stock up to 1-inch thickness
Has 1-to-5 slope for softwoods and 1-to-8 slope for hardwoods
cons: A few said it didn't meet their expectations

customer_reviews.title: Open package, previously used
customer_reviews.text: I have received mine in an open package, meaning the transparent plastic around the item was already cut. This tool also presented signs of wear. To me it indicates that it had been returned at some point, and then shipped again. With that being said, I am not going to return the item because the item seems to be fully functional, and for such a small item, a little cosmetic imperfection doesn't bother me. I can polish the brass and make it look new again.
customer_reviews.author: Sketchg4

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but I am impressed with the quality for the price. Yes, it is made in Asia, but it is also just a brass angle guide. Anything the best blacksmiths could make out of brass a hundred years ago, a sloppy machinist in Taiwan could probably do better today... The angles are correct, and the finish is bright and smooth. What else do you want at this price point?
customer_reviews.author: aoneal

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it should. Is built like an older tool that was meant to be kept forever. Not much else to say about it except that I am more than pleased with it. Especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: scratchcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gauge
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dovetail gauge. Seems to be quality made and works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Still haven't the chance to use, but build quality seems pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Dobry

customer_reviews.title: Just stop searching here and buy this one!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jig' extremely sturdy, well last a long time!! Definitely a recommended purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: jo$n0035

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The dovetail jig is well made and easy to use. Its simplicity of use makes marking dovetails repetitively an easy chore.
customer_reviews.author: Sunking

customer_reviews.title: Bent in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bent in transit, or delivery, otherwise pretty nice looking jig
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Glazik

customer_reviews.title: great very happy
customer_reviews.text: cool jig, inexpensive way to start building dovetails fast. looks like a old vintage tool nice clean design
customer_reviews.author: LiliVale

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I like the brass feel. It will last a lifetime. Much better than plastic. It's a good jig
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, definitely a tool that will last a lifetime and beyond
customer_reviews.author: WorkingArt91

customer_reviews.title: Brass, will not get broke
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for grandson who is starting woodworking. It looked nice when wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Haven't used it yet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Haven't used it yet. Had a gift card and have been eyeing this for a bit :-)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: works as they should.
customer_reviews.text: Edges are a bit rough, but for the price worth a few moments with some fine sandpaper to smooth them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Marcq

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it should last
customer_reviews.text: This is simple but well made. Seems like it should last.
customer_reviews.author: shade tree mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: Solid brass and a lifetime tool. I'm building drawers for my workbench and wanted to learn dovetails by hand. Quality tool I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shops2xs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Need video on how to use. I like the tool but there aren’t any training videos anywhere on how to use this tool. Only other types. I’ll give a better rating if there were some videos or instructions
customer_reviews.author: DJ Reggie Reg

customer_reviews.title: A good paperweight
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from a solid brass dovetail jig. It works fine but didn't meet my expectation. My steel one is much better
customer_reviews.author: Fishin Bob

customer_reviews.title: ... just paid the extra 20 bucks to get the better one the first time
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I thought it was I should of just paid the extra 20 bucks to get the better one the first time
customer_reviews.author: Steven kessler

customer_reviews.title: Can't Wait To Try It
customer_reviews.text: Nice price; delivered on time and as described. Haven't had a chance to give it a run through, but I have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: Tex Out West

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Nicely made heavy brass with clear proportion markings. Only downside was slight roughness on edges. Cleaned up easily with small fine file in about three minutes. This tool should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: oldwoodguy

product_meta.title: Taytools Solid Brass Dovetail Marking Jig Dovetail Marker for Stock up to 1" Thick with Slopes 1:5 (softwoods) and 1:8 (hardwoods). DTSB5-8
product_meta.description: Complete layout lines for hand cut dovetails with precision and ease with this compact solid brass dovetail marker. It will mark dovetails in stock up to 1 inch thick in both 1:5 and 1:8 slopes. Template portion is CNC machined made from solid brass. Slope markings photoetched.
feature_bullets: Complete layout lines for hand cut dovetails with precision and ease
Marks dovetails in stock up to 1 inch thick
Has 1:5 slope for softwoods and 1:8 slope for hardwoods .
Template portion is CNC machined from solid brass .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
